Containers.Name: rclone
Containers.Description:
The plugin installs rclone. rclone is a command line program to sync files and directories to and from services such as: * Amazon Drive * Amazon S3 * Backblaze B2 * Box * Dropbox * FTP * Google Cloud Storage * Google Drive * HTTP * Microsoft Azure Blob Storage * Microsoft OneDrive * Nextcloud * ownCloud * SFTP * WebDAV * The local filesystem * And many more
Go to http://rclone.org/ for more information.
